title: China may hold large-scale drill by year-end: Taiwan intelligence head
description: Taiwan's top intelligence chief on Wednesday said it was not unlikely that China's military holds another large-scale military drill before the end of this year and that Taiwan has to stay prepared.
content:
ROC Central News Agency
12/03/2025 12:46 PM
Taipei, Dec. 3 (CNA) Taiwan's top intelligence chief on Wednesday said it was not unlikely that China's military holds another large-scale military drill… [+2342 chars]
